body.p: The boards decided that an entity should apply IFRS 15 using either of the following methods:

li.p: retrospectively to each prior reporting period presented in accordance with IAS 8 or Topic 250 Accounting Changes and Error Corrections, subject to some optional practical expedients (see paragraphs BC435–BC438); or

retrospectively with the cumulative effect of initially applying IFRS 15 recognised as an adjustment to the opening balance of retained earnings at the date of initial application (see paragraphs BC439–BC444).
